name: I Just Wanted A Brain (Matteo95)
description:
Play as a zombie, eat brains, avoid dying... again and find the cure to become human again!

I just wanted a brain is a casual 3D game with elements of stealth and puzzles, inspired by classics such as resident evil, but with the difference that the player will not be a human against zombies, but will impersonate bob, a zombie awakened in a wood without memories of his human past, but with his intellectual abilities still unaltered, through his journey to find a cure to reobtain his human form.

This project is only a demo and has only two playable levels; the full game is still in development.

I developed this demo together with my team for the Videogame Design and Programming at the Politecnico di Milano.

If you are fascinated by zombie apocalypses, want to experience one in a comical and non-sense environment and above all want to side with the zombies, you can read a detailed description of the demo and download it at this link:

https://polimi-game-collective.itch.io/i-just-wanted-a-brain

If you want to take a look at all the features implemented and those planned for the final version of the game, you can download the Game Design Document.
